rules_text:
Augment {1}{U}{R} [i]({1}{U}{R}: Put a charge counter on this card. Augment only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. If you do, copy it for each charge counter on Jalenne's Masterpiece, then exile it.
Equip {U}{R}
